articles.content: One of the top features introduced with macOS Monterey is the Shortcuts app. Previewed during the WWDC21 keynote, the operating system is set to launch this fall. This marks the first time the Shortc… [+2034 chars]

articles.author: Salvador Rodriguez
articles.title: As offices shut down for Covid, workers bought vans and hit the road — and some don't want to return - CNBC
articles.description: A number of workers have used the freedom of working remotely during the pandemic to leave behind their sedentary housing and move full-time into vans.
articles.content:
Smriti Bhadauria and Kartik Vasan have been traveling in their 1977 Dodge B200 Tradesman since leaving Toronto in August 2020.
